descriptor.name: LOreal Concealer
descriptor.long_desc: With the L'Oréal Paris Infallible Full Wear Maximum Coverage Concealer in Beige 314, achieve a flawless, long-lasting complexion. This high-coverage concealer offers a waterproof, full-coverage formula designed to seamlessly mask imperfections, dark circles, and blemishes without settling into fine lines. The lightweight yet powerful formula blends effortlessly into the skin, providing an even, natural matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours. Perfect for all skin types, the multi-use concealer can be applied to contour, highlight, or conceal, giving you a radiant, polished look all day.
descriptor.short_desc: Paris Infallible Full Wear Maximum Coverage Concealer 10 ml - Beige 314
